Setting Up Claude Code

Complete guide to installing and configuring Claude Code for maximum productivity.

Last updated: Feb 8, 2026

Setting Up Claude Code

Get Claude Code up and running in minutes.

Installation

macOS

brew install claude-code

Linux

curl -fsSL https://claude.ai/install.sh | sh

Windows

Download from claude.ai/code/download

Authentication

claude-code auth login

Follow the browser prompt to authenticate.

Configuration

Edit ~/.claude-code/config.json:

{
  "model": "claude-3-sonnet",
  "editor": "vscode",
  "autoSave": true,
  "securityLevel": "high"
}

First Command

claude-code "Create a React component for a login form"

IDE Integration

VS Code

Install the Claude Code extension:

code --install-extension anthropic.claude-code

JetBrains

Download from JetBrains Marketplace.

Tips

  • Use claude-code --help for all commands
  • Set up keyboard shortcuts in your IDE
  • Enable auto-completion for faster coding

Troubleshooting

Issue: Authentication fails Solution: Clear cache with claude-code auth logout and try again

Issue: Slow responses Solution: Switch to claude-3-haiku for faster (but less accurate) responses
